title: Bioshock.Infinite.Complete.Edition.Steam.Rip-Origins
description:
Bioshock.Infinite.Complete.Edition.Steam.Rip-Origins


Released: March 26, 2013
Genre: Action  FPS  Epic
Publication Type: Digital License [Steam-Rip]
Game Language: English [Multi 11]
Voice Language: English,[Multi 6]
Crack: (Steam006)



System requirements:  
=============================

Operating system: Windows 8 / Windows 7 SP1 / Windows Vista SP2
(Windows XP - not supported!)
Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO processor with a clock frequency of 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon X2
processor with a clock frequency of 2.7 GHz or better
RAM: 2 GB or more
Video: supports DirectX 10, ATI Radeon HD 3870 or NVIDIA 8800 GT or Intel HD 3000 or better
Free hard drive space: 43 GB


Game Information:  
============================

1912.
United States achieved world domination, and the floating city of Columbia,
opened with great fanfare by the enthusiastic audience jubilation, became
majestic symbol of American ideals.

However, a promising venture soon turned into a disaster: for some unknown
reason, the city suddenly disappeared in the sky-high given.
America's greatest achievement has disappeared without a trace ...

In this story full of mysteries main role for the former detective agency
Pinkerton Booker DeWitt.He was sent to Colombia with the aim to find
and release some of Elizabeth, for which the city of the future has
become a flying prison in childhood.

Detective will establish a relationship with the girl, to the full extent of its use
and its unusual ability - because out of Columbia, which loses altitude every
second (and therefore its collapse - a matter of time), they get only a couple.

Supplement "Clash in the Clouds" is focused on the combat component of BioShock Infinite.
Combine weapons, energy, gears, breaks and aerotrassy most unimaginable ways and get
out of the most difficult situations.

You will test 60 brand new maps.
Take the test "Blue Ribbon" and open sketches golosofony, kinetoscopes etc.
Columbia Archaeological Society.

In addition "Burial at Sea - Episode 1" you along with Booker and Elizabeth return to Rapture
shortly before the fall of the underwater city.You will see the Rapture, which is not seen it before.

This diamond shining on the ocean floor has been re-created from scratch for the engine BioShock Infinite.
Rebalanced and redesigned game system fights emphasis on resource management and secrecy
that allowed to combine the best of BioShock and BioShock Infinite.

New weapons, the old favorite weapons of the original BioShock, the return wheel arms,
the new plasmids, new gear and breaks.

In "Burial at Sea - Episode 2" you can see the world through the eyes of Elizabeth.
The final part, talking about events after the addition of "" Burial at sea - Episode 1 ""
gives you the role of Elizabeth, who wanders through Rapture, trying to rescue the
abandoned little sister.

Studio Irrational Games, BioShock has created and BioShock Infinite, develops saga
"" Burial at Sea "," featuring previously hidden parts of Rapture.

Explore the city and take part in the plot, which involves almost all the key characters
of BioShock and BioShock Infinite.

Style games focused on masking, you'll gain new weapons and plasmids, retaining some
of the old favorite.

BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea - Episode 2 is the last of three additions to BioShock Infinite
and closes the main storyline of the game and "Burial at sea".

Game Features:  
============================

* Immerse yourself in the enchanting atmosphere of bright original world in the style
of American industrialism, embodied on the Unreal Engine 3.

* Solving puzzles disclosure sinister secrets and the struggle for life in a dizzying battles
under the clouds - not stay in Colombia is neither boring nor monotonous

* Use at its discretion, a lot of weapons and abilities rather trivial characters.
In the celestial world hostile Elizabeth become your faithful companion.

* And let her actions run the game for you, it is sure to become a real, live person.

* Love the ordeal? So, you just addressed mode increased realism - "1999."
Accept the challenge to developers - and you have to carefully weigh the "pros"
and "cons" before making any decision. How should I think over the line of the
hero - remember that the possibility of his resurrection and limited any misstep
could lead to the sudden termination of the game.

Release Information:  
============================
Steam Application ID: 8870
Game Version: 1.1.25.5165
Content is identical to the licensed version of the game distributed on Steam.


The release includes DLC:  
============================

Industrial Revolution pack
Columbia's Finest Pack
Upgrade pack
Industrial Revolution Rewards Pack
Comstock's Bird's Eye Sniper Rifle
Comstock's China Broom Shotgun
Clash in the Clouds
Burial at Sea - Episode 1
Burial at Sea - Episode 2

No need for third-party installers and updates.
Game content packaged in a simple installer with little compression.

Installation:  
=====================================

Typical installation: 

1. Install the game by running Setup.exe
2. Copy the contents of the folder Crack in a folder with a game
3. Play.

Installing client Steam (only for holders of a license key) 

Attention! Before installing the client in Steam,
the game should already be registered on the account,
and the client Steam - closed.

1. Run the file and follow the instructions SteamInstallHelper.exe installer.
2. Play
